name: PuzzlePet - Feed your cat (itch)
description:
Kittens love to play and walk everywhere until they get tired, then it's time to sleep or eat. In this game, solve puzzles by managing food and feeding the kittens scattered across the stage.

Simple controls to play.

Simple controls to play.

Feed your cat.

Functionalities:

  • Click to move, collect and feed the kittens.
  • Minimalist graphics;
  • 50 levels;
  • Relaxing music

Feed a cute kitten today!
